Uses of Class
com.here.android.mpa.routing.Maneuver

  • Packages that use Maneuver 
    Package Description
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance
    This package includes classes, interfaces, and enumerations related to guidance and turn-by-turn navigation, used by other packages in the APIs for Android SDK.
    com.here.android.mpa.routing
    This package provides classes, interfaces, and enumerations for route calculation and route description (directions).

    • Uses of Maneuver in com.here.android.mpa.guidance

      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.guidance that return Maneuver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Maneuver NavigationManager.getAfterNextManeuver()
      Returns the Maneuver after the next Maneuver
      Maneuver NavigationManager.getNextManeuver()
      Returns the next maneuver on the route, or null if no next maneuver.

    • Uses of Maneuver in com.here.android.mpa.routing

      Subclasses of Maneuver in com.here.android.mpa.routing 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TransitManeuver
      Represents the transit specific action required to leave one street segment and enter the next in the chain of directions that comprises a calculated Transit Route .
      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.routing that return Maneuver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Maneuver Route.getFirstManeuver()
      Returns the first Maneuver.
      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.routing that return types with arguments of type Maneuver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Maneuver> Route.getManeuvers()
      Gets the list of all maneuvers that travelers will encounter along the route.
      java.util.List<Maneuver> UMRoute.getManeuvers()
      Returns an empty list in an Urban Mobility route calculation.
      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.routing with parameters of type Maneuver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RouteElements Route.getRouteElements(Maneuver maneuver)
      Gets the RouteElements belonging to this Maneuver.
